parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From apo and allasso; to change away, i.e. Release, remove.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: How much, how great, how many, as great as, as much. By reduplication from hos; as As.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
To live, be alive. A primary verb; to live.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Involved in, held in, hence: liable, generally with dat. (or gen.) of the punishment. From enecho; liable to.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
(a) fear, terror, alarm, (b) the object or cause of fear, (c) reverence, respect. From a primary phebomai; alarm or fright.
Death, physical or spiritual. From thnesko; death.
